module.name: Voicemail
module.changelog: *1.5* Fix issue with vm options not being saved on creation of extension *1.4.2* Change category to Basic *1.4.1* Fixed radio button defaults to 'no' from false so they work *1.4* First release for 2.2. Fix inability to create voicemail box
module.description: This module allows you to configure Voicemail for a user or extension
